pillars_tab <- flextable(pillars) %>%
  add_header_lines('SPI Pillars Metadata.') %>%
  set_header_labels(values=list(
                       pillar_number="ID",
                       pillar_name="Pillar Name",
                       spi_indicator_description="Brief Description"
                                   )) 

FitFlextableToPage(pillars_tab) %>%
  width(width=1.63)
